ogrynTalents.name: Smash'Em Good!
ogrynTalents.description: Replenish 20% Toughness on Single Enemy Heavy Melee Hit.

ogrynTalents.name: Best Form of Defence...
ogrynTalents.description: Replenish 20% Toughness on Hitting Multiple Enemies with a single Heavy Melee Attack.

ogrynTalents.name: Heavyweight
ogrynTalents.description: +50% Melee Damage (Bulwarks, Crushers, Plague classes/Ogryns, Reapers). +50% Damage Reduction (Bulwarks, Crushers, Plague classes/Ogryns, Reapers).

ogrynTalents.name: Bombs Away!
ogrynTalents.description: Hitting a Carapace Armoured enemy with your Big Box of Hurt causes it to open, releasing grenades around the target.

ogrynTalents.name: Blood and Thunder
ogrynTalents.description: +1 Bleed Stack on Heavy Melee Hit.

ogrynTalents.name: Lead the Charge
ogrynTalents.description: When you activate Bull Rush, allies in Coherency gain 25% movement speed for 4 seconds.

ogrynTalents.name: Bullfighter
ogrynTalents.description: +10% Bull Rush Cooldown Reduction when you or an ally in Coherency kills an Elite enemy.

ogrynTalents.name: Bloodthirst
ogrynTalents.description: +10% Damage Resistance per Bleeding Enemy in Melee range. Stacks 5 times.

ogrynTalents.name: Hard As Nails
ogrynTalents.description: -25% Damage Taken for each ally currently Knocked Down or Incapacitated.

ogrynTalents.name: Payback Time
ogrynTalents.description: When an enemy damages you, gain +20% damage against enemies of the same type for 5 seconds.

ogrynTalents.name: Knife Through Butter
ogrynTalents.description: Fully charged heavy attacks have unlimited Cleave.

ogrynTalents.name: Raging Bull
ogrynTalents.description: +5% Damage (Next Melee Hit) on Melee Hit for each enemy Hit with the initial Attack.

ogrynTalents.name: Bull Gore
ogrynTalents.description: +2 Bleed Stacks on Enemies Hit by Bull Rush.

ogrynTalents.name: Unstoppable
ogrynTalents.description: Increases the distance you travel with Bull Rush by 100%, and you cannot be blocked by enemies except Monstrosities.

ogrynTalents.name: Non-stop Violence
ogrynTalents.description: Replenish 10% Toughness per Bull Rush Hit.
